title: podspeak
description: Social podcast player build with React, Apollo, GraphQL.

title: market-view
description: Simple data visualization for stocks. User can enter stock symbols and get a quick snapshot of trading information. React, API, Victory, Materialize

title: food-brain
description: Foodbrain is a food-and-recipe-management tool that helps you keep track of your food, so you don't have to think so much about what to cook. You can easily enter your foods into the app and get recipes recommendations based on your current foods.

title: word-rumpus
description: App that teaches children to spell and read. Galvanize Q3 group project. Contributers: Nathan Peterson, Lena Venable, Kyle Braden

title: island of despair
description: A time-based survival game based on the plot of Daniel Defoe's Robinson Crusoe. JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap
